author: Staff Reporter
text:
A paddy procurement centre where farmers can directly sell their produce was opened at Elandakuttai panchayat in Pallipalayam panchayat union here.

Minister for Industries and Transport P. Thangamani, in the presence of District Collector V. Dakshinamoorthy, inaugurated the centre on the premises of Ponkaliamman temple.

Fine variety paddy would be procured at Rs. 1,520 per quintal and common variety at Rs. 1,460 per quintal. The Minister also distributed power drillers, rotavator machines, seeds and other gadgets to a few farmers on the occasion.

Tiruchengode Revenue Divisional Officer G. Mahatma, Tami Nadu Civil Supplies Corporation zone manager R. Mani, Joint Registrar of Cooperative Societies K. Gandhinathan and other officials were present.
title: Paddy procurement centre opened in Pallipalayam
